citeinfo.origin: University of British Columbia, Department of Botany, Herbarium
citeinfo.title: Alaska Seaweed Database: A Flora of the Benthic Marine Algae of Alaska, Phase I, an Inventory of Existing Collections (Type Specimen Data)

descript.abstract: First comprehensive cataloguing of the marine benthic algae (seaweeds) occurring along Alaska coast. (By Sandra Lindstrom, UBC and Gayle Hansen, OSU)
descript.purpose: To provide information on the type specimens of species of seaweeds reported to occur in Alaska.

idinfo.useconst: Permission is granted to persons affiliated with academic and non-profit organizations to use University of British Columbia data obtained via the Internet for scientific and scholarly purposes only.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system.
